name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Raymond W. FARABAUGH, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Raymond W. FARABAUGH, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of November, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue is:
Whether the Superior Court erred, while acting sua sponte, when it incorrectly found that new amendments to 42 Pa.C.S. § 9799.13 excluded the crime of [ijndecent [ajssault (18 Pa. C.S.A. § 3126(a)(8)) from list [sic] of mandated sex offender registry crimes.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
105 A.3d 655
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Raymond W. FARABAUGH, Respondent.
No. 333 WAL 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 26, 2014.
